creator: ghamann@descartes.com

text:
I've put in the suggested change.  However, I don't have an https server to 
test this on, and I just don't know if authorization works the same under https 
as under http.  If the original bug submitter could test this and email the 
JMeter mailing list with the results, I'd appreciate it.
creator: mstover1@apache.org

text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
